exm.mng: Ayurveda (ancient Indian system and health care philosophy)
lit. Sichuan dogs bark at the sun (idiom); fig. a simpleton will marvel at even the most universal known., alludes to the Sichan foggy weather where it's uncommon to see a sunny day
Ayurveda (ancient Indian system and health care philosophy), also written 阿育吠陀[a1 yu4 fei4 tuo2]
lit. Sichuan dogs bark at the sun (idiom); fig. a simpleton will marvel at even the most common things, alludes to the Sichuan foggy weather where it's uncommon to see a sunny day
